about_the_game:
Deep Fringe is a dark hardcore tactical game set in a biopunk wasteland. Lead a squad with unique abilities in turn-based combat, where strategic mastery of the environment is key.

Join our community on Discord or QQ: 334611081 

THE TERRAIN IS YOUR DOMAIN

Navigate and transform spaces; modify, destroy, or replace grid elements to exploit terrain height and effects, gaining tactical advantages by strategically positioning your squad.

DEEP CHARACTER MODIFICATIONS

Combine unique character compositions with devastating firepower, and upgrade their arsenal to get the most out of their abilities and dominate each encounter.

TITANIC DOMINATION, BREAK LIMITS

Command ultra-large units that control multiple grids, capable of unleashing devastating attacks and altering the flow of battle.

EDIT LEVELS, CREATE LEGENDS

Employ the built-in graphical editor to easily create your own levels, characters, and campaigns, with ALL GAME ASSETS AVAILABLE! Share your creations with players worldwide through the workshop and experience limitless adventures.

UNCOVER THE TRUTH

Venture into dangerous endless territories, uncovering the secrets of the apocalypse that changed the world forever and the histories of rival factions with each expedition.

KEEP FRIENDS CLOSE, ENEMIES CLOSER

Encounter a variety of characters and factions. Form alliances or incite rivalries, making strategic choices that forge your path and shape your story.

short_description: At its heart, Deep Fringe is deep tactical combat experience set in a biopunk wasteland. Lead powerful factions in turn-based battles, leveraging the strategic use of an interactive environment. Modify or destroy terrain to achieve tactical supremacy. Craft legendary chapters with the level editor.
